about_the_game:
Welcome to the eerie world of IDLES OF TORMENT! A bone-chilling horror idle game that will test your resolve as you care for your pet idol.

In the darkest corners of a forgotten realm, a mysterious pet idol awaits your attention. This enigmatic creature is no ordinary companion; it thrives on torment and feeds on sacrifice. Your mission is to keep it satisfied, even as it grows increasingly sinister and powerful. As the idol pet grows, so too will the horrors that inhabit your surroundings, making this game an escalating journey into the unknown.

Game Features:

The Pet Idol: Meet your idol, a creature born of shadows and nightmares. It craves torment, and the more torment it consumes, the stronger it becomes. Nurture it with your sacrifices and watch it evolve into something truly terrifying.

Retro Horror Music: Immerse yourself in a spine-chilling world filled with haunting visuals and unsettling audio by Carl Kasey @ White Bat Audio. The atmosphere will keep you on edge as you delve deeper into the darkness. In-game bonus pet if you click on the AMBITION tab within the game.

Unlock New Horrors: As your pet idol becomes more powerful, it unlocks new abilities and unleashes increasingly terrifying horrors upon your world. Discover and adapt to these nightmarish challenges. [Coming soon!]

Cursed Artifacts: Collect cursed artifacts to enhance your pet idol's abilities or torment your sacrificial fodder. Choose your strategy wisely to keep your pet satiated.

Are you brave enough to confront your darkest fears, feed your pet idol, and survive the horrors that await you in IDLES OF TORMENT? Dive into this spine-tingling idle horror game and discover just how terrifyingly addictive it can be. Remember, sacrifice is its nourishment, and the deeper you go, the darker it gets.

Idles of Torment is currently in active development.
